languages.text: {n}Змеиная голова поворачивается к вам нечеловечески плавным движением, раздвоенный язык пробует воздух.{/n} "Я — Злоба. Ты — неудобство. Убирайся, если не хочешь узнать, как Злоба разбирается с неудобствами, людишко".

{n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."
languages.original_text: {n}Змеиная голова поворачивается к вам нечеловечески плавным движением, раздвоенный язык пробует воздух.{/n} "Я — Злоба. Ты — неудобство. Убирайся, если не хочешь узнать, как Злоба разбирается с неудобствами, людишко".

traits.locale_text: {n}His snake-like head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out what Malice does to inconveniences, humanling."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}His snake-like head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out what Malice does to inconveniences, humanling."

traits.speaker: Anger

traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}他的蛇头以无比流畅的动作转向了你，分叉的舌头舔着空气。{/n}“我就是恶棍，而你是个麻烦。赶紧滚，否则你就会知道恶棍会怎么处理麻烦，小人儿。”
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的蛇头以无比流畅的动作转向了你，分叉的舌头舔着空气。{/n}“我就是恶棍，而你是个麻烦。赶紧滚，否则你就会知道恶棍会怎么处理麻烦，小人儿。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Su cabeza serpentina se gira hacia ti y su lengua bífida degusta el aire.{/n} «Soy Malicia. Tú eres un incordio. Márchate, human{mf|o|a}, o descubrirás cómo me ocupo de los incordios».
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cabeza serpentina se gira hacia ti y su lengua bífida degusta el aire.{/n} «Soy Malicia. Tú eres un incordio. Márchate, human{mf|o|a}, o descubrirás cómo me ocupo de los incordios».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}彼の蛇の頭が、人体ではありえない滑らかさで振り返り、二股に分かれた舌が空気を読み取っている。{/n}「私はマリス。貴様は邪魔者だ。この場から消えろ、さもなくばマリスが邪魔者をどのように始末するのか徹底的に教えてやる…人間風情が」
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の蛇の頭が、人体ではありえない滑らかさで振り返り、二股に分かれた舌が空気を読み取っている。{/n}「私はマリス。貴様は邪魔者だ。この場から消えろ、さもなくばマリスが邪魔者をどのように始末するのか徹底的に教えてやる…人間風情が」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Sein Schlangenkopf dreht sich mit einer unmenschlich flüssigen Bewegung zu dir, seine gespaltene Zunge kostet die Luft.{/n} "Ich bin Tücke. Ihr seid eine Unannehmlichkeit. Verschwindet, sonst erfahrt Ihr, wie Tücke mit Unannehmlichkeiten umgeht, Menschling."
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Schlangenkopf dreht sich mit einer unmenschlich flüssigen Bewegung zu dir, seine gespaltene Zunge kostet die Luft.{/n} "Ich bin Tücke. Ihr seid eine Unannehmlichkeit. Verschwindet, sonst erfahrt Ihr, wie Tücke mit Unannehmlichkeiten umgeht, Menschling."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Sa tête serpentine se tourne vers vous avec une fluidité non-humaine, sa langue fourchue goûtant l'air.{/n} « Je suis Démon. Et vous, vous m'importunez. Partez ou vous découvrirez comment je me débarrasse des importuns, {mf|humain|humaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa tête serpentine se tourne vers vous avec une fluidité inhumaine, sa langue fourchue goûtant l'air.{/n} « Je suis Démon. Et vous, vous m'importunez. Partez ou vous découvrirez comment je me débarrasse des importuns, {mf|humain|humaine}. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Çatallı dili havayı tadımlarken yılanımsı başını insan dışı bir akıcılıkla sana çeviriyor. {/n} "Doğrudur. Sen de baş belasısın. Kaybolmazsan baş belalarının icabına nasıl baktığımı göreceksin insancık."
languages.original_text: {n}His serpentine head turns to you with inhuman fluidity, his forked tongue tasting the air.{/n} "I am Malice. You are an inconvenience. Get lost, or you'll find out how Malice deals with inconveniences, humanling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çatallı dili havayı tadımlarken yılanımsı başını insan dışı bir akıcılıkla sana çeviriyor. {/n} "Doğrudur. Sen de başıma belasın. Kaybolmazsan baş belalarının icabına nasıl baktığımı göreceksin insancık."
traits.speaker: Anger
